byline.original: By JOHN SCHWARTZ and BENJAMIN WEISER

snippet: Almost all communications with outsiders are barred for Khalfan Khamis Mohamed, serving life for a United States Embassy bombing.
lead_paragraph: Almost all communications with outsiders are barred for Khalfan Khamis Mohamed, serving life for a United States Embassy bombing.

headline.main: Judge Allows Trial on Terrorist’s Challenge to Prison Rules
headline.print_headline: Judge Allows Trial on Terrorist’s Challenge to Prison Rules
headline.seo: Trial Allowed on Terrorist’s Suit Over Prison Rules
